pageContext.claim: “Over the next three years, we’re investing more than $6 billion in upgrades and modifications to these tanks -- that’s going to keep you very busy here -- almost twice the amount spent in the entire eight years of the previous administration, which was going down to nothing. Because you were closed; this place was closed.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has steered more funding to this tank plant in Ohio, but it was not in danger of closing.
